trans-unit.source: Represents a list of parameters that are used to query a data source.

Initializes new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class by using the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.WhereParameters"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.OrderGroupsByParameters"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.OrderByParameters"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.GroupByParameters"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.SelectParameters"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.Arguments"></xref> properties.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the `Where` clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the `OrderGroupsBy` clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the `OrderBy` clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the `GroupBy` clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the `Select` command.
The arguments to pass to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the arguments to pass to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class.
The arguments to pass to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify which properties are used to group the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create a `GroupBy` clause.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify which fields are used to order the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create an `OrderBy` clause.
Gets or set a collection of parameters that specify fields that are used to order grouped data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create an `OrderGroupsBy` clause.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify the properties and calculated values that are included in the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create a `Select` command.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify the conditions that must be true for a record to be included in the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create a `Where` clause.
